/usr/bin/clang++  -g   CMakeFiles/myprog.dir/main.cpp.o  -o myprog /usr/lib/libboost_date_time.a /usr/lib/libboost_regex.a /usr/lib/libboost_thread.a -lpthread /usr/lib/libboost_serialization.a /usr/lib/libboost_system.a /usr/lib/libboost_log.a /usr/lib/libboost_log_setup.a /usr/lib/libboost_program_options.a /usr/lib/libboost_graph.a /usr/lib/libboost_chrono.a /usr/lib/libboost_atomic.a /usr/lib/libboost_filesystem.a
